liste.punkt: You apply on The Norwegian Labor Inspection Authority's form "relocation / facilitation due to pregnancy" (no. 474 b).
The doctor or midwife fills out their part of the form. The form is to be delivered to your employer.
If your employer is unable to relocate you or give you other duties, the employer must fill out their part of the form before sending it to NAV together with the frontpage
